desc.p: This field is always defaulted as 1. The net performance is calculated during runtime by time series enquiry based on specified PERF.TYPE which is selected from PERF.TYPE field-value from AM.PERF.PARMETER .
This field is not currently in use.
This field holds the recoverable tax amount.

Sub Period Index of every day compared to previous day.
(1) To calculate MV1 / MV2 where MV1 = VALUE.END.DAY(current day) + OUT.FLOW - IN.FLOW MV2 = VALUE.END.DAY(previous day) or BEGIN.VALUE
Contains one of the following values:
Blank (Automatic): The performance was generated automatically by the system
R (Backvalue): The performance was recalculated by the system by the back-value process.

P (Purged): Sub-Case of R. The Performance should have been recalculated by the back-value process but this has not been done because the corresponding valuation history data was purged in SC.VEH file.
M (Manual): The performance was manually inputted or corrected by the user. The performance was imported from an external file.
